summary: In Hamburg, a rocker biker gang helps a kid avenge his brother who was murdered by a rival gang, a mortal enemy of rocker gangs.
cast: Hans-Jürgen Modschiedler|Gerd Kruskopf|Michael-Thomas Krannich|Paul Lys|Marianne Mim|Heidrun Rieckmann|Dennis O. Heinrich|Joe Ebel|Dieter Lennssen|Ole Jürgens|Thomas Dunker|Marianne Quast|Walter Zahn|Eva Pampuch|Die Bloody Devils|Marianne Kassler
title: Rocker
